name: Move Box
description:
Control two characters, the player and the ghost, to get the treasure!
The player can move and jump.
The ghost can't get coins or treasure, but he can push blocks.
If you don't push the block enough times before you get the treasure, your mission is complete!

----- Controls -----

< Menu >

* Mouse Cursor or Arrow Keys or WASD - Select
* Mouse Click or [Space] or [Enter] or [Z] - Confirm
* [Escape] or [Backspace] or [X] - Back

< Game >

* WASD - Move Player, Jump Player
* Arrow Keys - Move Ghost
* [P] or [Space] - Pause
* [R] - Retry
